definition: body/life/oneself/personally/one's morality and conduct/the main part of a structure or body/pregnant/classifier for sets of clothes: suit, twinset/Kangxi radical 158
major turning point of lifelong import (esp. marriage)
lit. teacher for one day, father for ever (idiom)
pinyin: yi1 ri4 wei2 shi1 , zhong1 shen1 wei2 fu4

definition: to pledge eternal love (idiom)/to exchange marriage vows
to make a pledge to be married, without parents' approval

sentences.english: A lecturer in the English Department has recently been refused tenure .
sentences.chinese: 英語系一名講師最近未能獲得終身職位。

sentences.english: Their employees enjoy life tenure and cannot be terminated.
sentences.chinese: 其員工享有職位終身制，無法終止勞動關係。

sentences.english: Are you sure you want him to your partner?
sentences.chinese: 你肯定你想營他作陪的終身伴侶嗎？

sentences.english: Lorz was immediately banned for life from any future amateur competition.
sentences.chinese: 洛爾斯隨即被宣判終身不得參加任何業餘比賽。

sentences.english: Correia has watched her brother spend half his life in prison.
sentences.chinese: 科雷亞已經看了她的哥哥花一半他終身監禁。

sentences.english: Since Post-tenure Review is originated from tenure, this chapter introduces the identity of tenure briefly first.
sentences.chinese: 第二部分主要介紹終身教授職後評估的產生及發展。

sentences.english: He doesn't have tenure, so he tends to be a bit edgier.
sentences.chinese: 他沒有終身職位，所以他有不耐煩的傾向。

sentences.english: The best way to grow is life long education.
sentences.chinese: 成長最好的方法就是終身教育。

sentences.english: Mr. Riordan is a Trustee for Life of the International Council of Shopping Centers.
sentences.chinese: 澤爾丹先生是國際購物中心協會的終身理事。

sentences.english: Gone are the days when a diploma determines your life-time fate.
sentences.chinese: 一紙文憑定終身的時代一去不返。

sentences.english: Marriage should be about accepting a person with their good and bad points- for life.
sentences.chinese: 結婚應該將用他們的好和壞點終身接受一個人。

sentences.english: This unique gift will make them unforgetable.
sentences.chinese: 這種別出心裁的“紀念禮物”，將會讓他們終身難忘。

sentences.english: Send this phrase to the people you will never forget .
sentences.chinese: 把這個句子發給你終身不忘的人。

sentences.english: "- the people's victim and life-long bond-slave, as they fancied her, might say to them.
sentences.chinese: 人們心目中的這個犧牲品和終身奴僕會對他們這樣說。

sentences.english: I will be deeply grateful to you for your kindness for the rest of my life.
sentences.chinese: 您對我的恩情使我終身銘感。

sentences.english: He also believes in lifetime employment.
sentences.chinese: 御手洗還支持員工終身僱用制。

definition: (conjunction used to express contrast with a previous clause) but/then/standard/norm/principle/to imitate/to follow/classifier for written items
for this reason/with regards to this/in this respect/in order to do this/to this end
to agree (to do sth)/should/ought to/must/(legal) shall
to answer/to respond/to comply with/to deal or cope with
and/furthermore/also/together with/(not) at all/simultaneously/to combine/to join/to merge
to promise/to undertake to do something/commitment
will/shall/to use/to take/to checkmate/just a short while ago/(introduces object of main verb, used in the same way as 把[ba3])
one's conduct/deed/activity/accomplishment/achievement/to act as/as (in the capacity of)/qua/to view as/to look upon (sth as)/to take sth to be
